title: Incorrect sha256sum for libjpeg-turbo@2.0.4
body:
There is a mismatch between the shasum in the recipe and the shasum of the tarball hosted on github. (Note that the shasum matches that of the tarball at the sourceforge mirror)  Bug seems to have been introduced in #17132

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git
$ source spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
$ spack install libjpeg-turbo@2.0.4
```
### Information on your system
Spack debug report:
```console
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1480-1de20f0
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-skylake
```

### Additional information
No build logs created.

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files (N/A)
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
